author: brianp
msg: On systems without poll, limit apr_pollset's capacity to
the number of descriptors that select can handle
(this is why testpoll test #4 was failing on win32)

author: brianp
msg: Test apr_poll() with larger numbers of descriptors

author: bnicholes
msg: NetWare can't handle mixed descriptor sets.  Added code to make sure that
the set contain only socket or pipe descriptors.

author: bnicholes
msg: Introducing a new API for resolving the file name to disk

author: trawick
msg: fix a compile break on stock FreeBSD 3.4 (gcc 2.7.2.3)
